alert.note: Alert for Mazatzal Mountains; New River Mesa; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 13 at 2:41AM MST until December 15 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...New River Mesa, Mazatzal Mountains, Pinal/Superstition Mountains and Southeast Gila County. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Mazatzal Mountains; New River Mesa; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Southeast Gila County
